books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel exploring totalitarianism, surveillance, and freedom.

books.title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck

books.description: A counterintuitive approach to living a good life by focusing on what truly matters.

books.description: A feminist retelling of the story of Circe, the witch from Greek mythology.
